snippet.title: Barbie (Hi-Tech Expressions, 1991) - NES Gameplay
snippet.description:
Barbie for the NES is more of a platformer. Each level is a "dream" and each "dream" has Barbie walking left to right while avoiding obstacles or else her "Zs" will drop and she will have to replay the level, or sometimes restart the entire game. Barbie can request help from animals by pressing SELECT to choose what the animal should do and then pressing B to throw the command. If the command reaches the animal, the animal will do the command requested. Sometimes "Bosses" will appear, these "Bosses" are usually defeatable with the help of an animal. According to the box art, it's "a glamorous quest full of magic, fun and adventure!"


NESGUIDE ARCHIVE INFO

The original NES gameplay archive, est 2007 includes gameplay captures from all commercial releases from the US market with a few extras (like famicom releases) just for fun. As of Dec 2024, I've resumed efforts to update some of the older (some 360p) videos with higher-def captures. Text updates will be posted to BlueSky (which doesn't require an account to view). Please follow there (or just bookmark the url) if you're interested!

https://bsky.app/profile/nesguide.com
